summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Firebase authentication and security implementation. All authentication gating, listener management, and security rules are working correctly.
passed_tests: /firebase-test shows 'not logged in' message when unauthenticated
/firebase-test properly gates Firebase listeners behind authentication
/firebase-test shows proper error messages for unauthenticated operations
/dashboard redirects to /login when unauthenticated with proper next parameter
/dashboard does not attach Firebase listeners when unauthenticated
No Firebase listener errors on public routes (Home, Pricing)
All Firebase operations use users/{uid} paths as required
Firebase security rules properly enforce owner-only access
